about_the_game:
One day the sun disappeared, and now ghosts run rampant while humanity dwindles. Several years on, two siblings are pulled into a story much grander than their simple life in the darkness when a mysterious woman calls on them for help.



Travel through a world of dreams, chasing down the man who can change everything. Recruit a team of survivors along the way and experience their stories and grow closer together at your evolving base camp.



Ghosts hide all around you, but with the help of your ghost companion Mac you can take them down in game-show style RPG battles. Gain experience and upgrade your party members with unique movesets and game-changing skills.



Choose a Gameplay Style:

Countdown: A focus on strategy and time-management, aim to complete your adventure within a limited number of in-game days.
Casual: Experience the story at your own pace with no limitations, and less challenge.

  • -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Features

    • a hand-crafted Open World
    • 8 Playable Party Members
    • over 100 Unique Enemies
    • low damage numbers
    • no random Encounters
    • no cluttered inventory
    • Upgrade your Basecamp
    • original Soundtrack By Floopy
